content: I'm attempting to build LLVM and LLD locally (I've set lld = true in my config.toml). However, I've run into the following error:

/home/aaron/repos/rust/src/llvm-project/lld/MachO/UnwindInfoSection.h:15:10: fatal error: 'mach-o/compact_unwind_encoding.h' file not found
#include "mach-o/compact_unwind_encoding.h"

Bug https://bugs.llvm.org/show_bug.cgi?id=49228 appears to be related. Has anyone run into this?
